#########################################################################
model{
	C <- 100000
	# Truco de los ceros
	for (i in 1:N){
		zZ[i] <- 0
		zZ[i] ~ dpois(phi[i])
		fZ[i] <- (alphaZ / sZ) * pow(z[i]/sZ , -alphaZ - 1) * exp(-pow(z[i]/sZ , -alphaZ))
		phi[i] <- -log(fZ[i]) + C
	}
	# Aprioris O3
	alphaZ ~  dunif(0,10)
	sZ ~ dunif(0,200)
}

data
list(z=c(153, 156, 159, 171, 160, 122, 116, 198, 85, 114, 121, 189, 139, 169, 214, 193, 285, 241, 157, 206, 191, 168, 225, 233, 173, 182, 242, 206, 240, 235, 191, 212, 186, 187, 219, 263, 221, 192, 213, 208, 188, 222, 142, 187, 145, 272, 189, 200, 194, 185, 207, 212, 213, 185, 188, 156, 146, 178, 220, 210, 276, 183, 211, 218, 251, 201, 162, 179, 181, 199, 198, 223, 288, 172, 179, 174, 190, 208, 168, 146, 161, 136, 181, 179, 165, 192, 189, 196, 210, 197, 134, 180, 192, 202, 178, 194, 209, 223, 249, 201, 206, 187, 154, 177, 201, 285, 157, 212, 215, 206, 208, 210, 200, 171, 169, 112, 99, 147, 154, 201, 192, 207, 222, 185, 201, 169, 151, 132, 131, 164, 187, 158, 189, 149, 194, 175, 171, 189, 144, 126, 124, 181, 157, 161, 175, 177, 181, 177, 163, 149, 117, 132, 128, 159, 165, 203, 121, 159, 155, 210, 146, 122, 114, 130, 127, 123, 155, 157, 129, 152, 163, 162, 186, 119, 136, 107, 123, 153, 153, 154, 156, 122, 145, 178, 156, 126, 106, 131, 120, 109, 139, 137, 125, 124, 157, 126, 177, 129, 105, 110, 99, 109, 145, 122, 127, 149, 153, 177, 136, 138, 117, 93, 109, 113, 124, 139, 152, 130, 126, 184, 142, 102, 89, 118, 110, 92, 128, 155, 155, 152, 166, 143, 144, 115, 109, 111, 118, 146, 146, 115, 130, 141, 155, 157, 162, 150, 114, 100, 96, 129, 146, 115, 97, 111, 159, 131, 150, 114, 118, 111, 158, 118, 151, 143, 119, 121, 163, 143, 142, 128, 107, 102, 111, 140, 165, 142, 126, 137, 132, 180, 162, 130, 100, 142, 113, 124, 125, 126, 130, 160, 142, 160, 138, 123, 115, 113, 122, 125, 114, 130, 121, 140, 158, 138, 160, 131, 120, 118, 128, 134, 116, 127, 141, 162, 163, 144, 172, 133, 120, 118, 107, 113, 104, 110, 136, 143, 124, 149, 171, 134, 118, 109, 132, 123, 131, 115, 115, 134, 124, 141, 151, 130, 115, 119, 117, 111, 146, 143, 112, 149, 147, 158, 142, 121, 111, 114, 108, 112, 107, 127, 118, 113, 126, 127, 127, 100, 96, 107, 114, 135, 127, 115, 101, 146, 131, 146, 133, 114, 115, 127, 120, 113, 128, 133), N=384)
